thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.dialaflight.com
thread.title: Katalin Ralph

author: Katalin Ralph
title: Katalin Ralph
text:
For the fourth year running we decided to go on a 'big' holiday with DialAFlight.
This time a 15 day trip around India and 7 nights in a Keralan beach resort.
The itinerary for the 15 day trip was tailor made and it went like clockwork. Every single pick up, driver, guide and representative was outstanding. All on time, very polite with very clean and efficient vehicles.
Hotels picked for us were first class and we had a fantastic time.
The beach resort hotel room was not suitable as it was substandard but the Indian agent very quickly acted to correct it by moving us to a suitable room without cost.
DialAFlight once again were excellent on organising a superb holiday experience. Nothing is ever too much for them even though we were very challenging along the planning stage.
Amazingly DialAFlight can still keep their 'phones answered within 5 seconds' promise which is spectacular.
Liam and his team, our personal contact, remains very efficient, friendly and keen to help.
We continue to use them as holiday planning is a pleasure with their help rather than a stressful experience.
Thanks Liam.
